reviews.review_msg: He is clearly a visionary and I must attest that much of accusations that the ethics commission have made against him are grossly exaggerated.

What troubled me at first about his teaching methods was his insistence that each student roll and smoke every chemical in the lab before using it for the first time so that we?d ?gain a closer appreciation for the essence of the molecule?. But I now, as a full time RA, suggest this technique to all new members of my lab.
Dr. Hopscotch is a god. 'Nough said.

Can I just say that Dr. Kenneth Hopscotch opened my eyes to the beautiful world of DNA. He touched me emotionally with his lectures on the relationship between Deoxy Ribo Nucleic Acid and a farm fresh egg. He showed me the ribosomes dont just package proteins, they package love.
This man is the greatest professor I believe I have ever, or will ever have. He has completed my career as a student in ways that a degree never will.
Oh my goodness, Dr. Hopscotch is the hottest prof ever! And so devilishly intelligent! What a dreamboat!

Dr. Kenneth Hopscotch might be the biggest hardass I've ever met. One of our class projects was to determine how to modify a mouse's DNA to make its fur secrete bleach. How am I supposed to do that in a single semester? And if you complain, he makes you carry these big, long, heavy black bags to the dumpster. How is that appropriate?

Dr. Hopscotch is an amazing geneticist, and he is a gifted teacher.  Assignments were fascinating- I engineered a chocolate flavored banana!  He blows my mind... although I'm very curious as to what happens behind the doors of his office... he is very secretive about his research.
